snippet.title: Black Resin - gameplay teaser
snippet.description:
Black Resin is an old-school, pixel art platformer that tells its story solely through gameplay and visuals. It is a homage to cinematic platformers.

Play demo on itch.io: https://bit.ly/2KlYDga
Follow our Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlackResinGame
